pages.text: It seems that a Cult Leader dropped what appears to be their holy book. You tried reading it, but you can't understand a word or meaning from it. It might be some ramblings penned by a mad man, or it could be something more...

In any case, perhaps a Librarian from a nearby Village can help decipher this mystery. You feel like you shouldn't use that Mending Librarian you worked hard to obtain to decipher it, you just have a bad feeling that it's not a good idea to do so.
